item.title: THE ESCAPE ROOM IS CLOSED UNTIL 27/11 14.30 ğŸ”’
item.description: The escape room will open on Friday the 27th of November at 14.30 to avoid people peeking around and finding some of the clues before the interactive session starts!

item.title: This is the final clue
item.description: Robin: One of the superstars fighting against the monopoly of the large publishers, and literally breaking down pay-walls is the developer of the website SciHub. In order to unlock the door and “escape” the room, you need to collect three colors The flag of the country where the founder of SciHub originated from has the colors blue and â€¦ What is the color of the key in the SciHub logo?

item.title: Time ğŸ•‘
What are the benefits of Open Access?
item.description: Teachers, practicioners and anyone else without access to research through an institution can access and use research to improve their work Academics in developing countries can access research and stay up to date in their fields Public Access: Taxpayers feel they get value for their money Increased visibility of research More citations (due to more visibility) Compliant with funders (and the Research Excellence Framework) More transparency so academics can replicate and validate previous research When data is shared openly it can be used in other studies; reducing time and effort More accurate reporting from journalists to the public Open Access publications can help inform policy â¥ â–² â—˜
